publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4760 Irene Oldfather: Choose Life - Suicide Prevention in North Ayrshire—That the Parliament notes that International Suicide Prevention Awareness Week runs from 4 to 10 September 2006; recognises that the theme of this year’s week is "Talking About Suicide Can Save Lives", acknowledges that a great deal of suicides can be prevented by encouraging people to talk about their problems; is aware that the Scottish Executive’s national Choose Life Strategy aims to reduce suicides by 20% by the year 2013 and that, since 2003, all Community Planning Partnership areas have produced and implemented a local Choose Life action plan; congratulates the North Ayrshire Choose Life Implementation Team for their work in tackling suicide awareness by producing leaflets, setting up a website and supporting suicide prevention projects throughout North Ayrshire, where 62 people have committed suicide since 2003, and supports any action to reduce Scotland’s suicide rate, which is currently higher than the rest of the United Kingdom, and offer support to people at risk.
